Hall 2-0-25.instruction: Walk 10 steps forward then turn left to reach Hall 2-0-25

Hall 2-0-16.instruction: Before entering, turn right to reach Hall 2-0-16

Stairs G.instruction: Walk straight for 25 steps to reach the stairs

Elevator G.instruction: Walk 20 steps forward, the elevator will be on your right

Entrance.instruction: Exit the hall and walk 10 steps to reach the entrance
Walk left to reach the entrance
Go down the stairs and walk 25 steps to reach the entrance

Floor 1.instruction: Go up the stairs for 25 steps to reach the first floor

Entrance.instruction: Exit the elevator area and walk 20 steps to reach the entrance

Floor 1.instruction: Take the elevator for 15 seconds to reach the first floor

Elevator F1.instruction: Turn right and walk 6 steps to reach the elevator

TA Office.instruction: Walk 2 steps after the elevator to reach the teaching assistants office

Dean Office.instruction: Turn left, walk 30 steps, the dean office will be on your right

Hall 2-1-47.instruction: Turn left, Hall 2-1-47 will be on your right

Section 2-1-41.instruction: Turn left and walk 15 steps to reach Section 2-1-41

Dean Office.instruction: Turn right and walk 20 steps to reach the dean office
